title: Include All Token Types
description: When enabled, exports all token types (not just colors) as XAML resources with appropriate type conversion

title: Max Tokens Per File
description: Maximum number of tokens to include in a single XAML file. Larger token sets will be split into multiple files

title: Group By Token Type
description: When enabled, creates separate XAML files for each token type (Colors.xaml, Typography.xaml, etc.)

title: Include Token Groups
description: When enabled, organizes tokens into ResourceDictionary sections based on their groups

title: Token Name Prefix
description: Prefix to add to all token names (e.g., 'DS_' for DesignSystem prefix)

title: File Name Template
description: Base name for generated XAML files. Will be suffixed with token type when grouping is enabled
